WorkItem.Description:
I have a property in my DTO declared as: 

        public LookupItem RegionType { get; set; }

However, when I invoke the mapping, it generates the error, "Expressions mapping from methods not supported yet.". 

However, if I change the string in the property name "Type" to anything else like "Typeo" or "ASDF", the mapping succeeds.  Am I breaking any convention rules here?  Below is the generated error:
